title: Voyageurs National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar             Calendar         People enjoying a snowshoe hike. NPS  Enjoy Programs All Year Join a ranger to experience Voyageurs National Park any time of year.   In the Summer and Fall  Kettle Falls Boat Cruises on Kabetogama Lake Grand Boat Tours on Rainy Lake North Canoe Programs throughout the park Garden Walks at the Rainy Lake Visitor Center Ellsworth Rock Garden Tours on Kabetogama Lake  In the Winter  Guided Snowshoe Hikes at the Rainy Lake Visitor Center  Special Events Special Events are offered throughout the year.
